title: You can delete a champion of your choice from the game
body:
Who is it and why. You can always not delete one.

Mine would probs be one of these:

{{champion:23}} (Ult, level 1/2 crit rngesus cheese) 
{{champion:55}} (Passive and r)
 {{champion:75}} (Most boring lane opponent, just ignores you after first back)
 {{champion:429}} (PassivePassivePassivePassivePassivePassivePassive)
